Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a red-brown pottery vessel, fabric has a grey core, interior and exterior slightly grooved, with faint traces of one line of black-painted hieratic text on the exterior, now very smudged.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393098) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393098)
